action.text: Ms. Clark (MA) moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 201 - 216, 1 Present (Roll no. 704).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 914.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 914, the Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 191, 5 Present (Roll no. 706).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: This resolution censures Representative Jamaal Bowman.
